column5: That should just about cover it Clamp-It  Good luck to you and everyone else making the trip  Cheers  Craig

Looks like you're a big fan of the dropper.  Never fished em for perch.  Here's my all time favourite Simcoe perch bait.    The 'ratso' by Custom Jigs and Spins, except witha  glow jig head.  They are really tiny and work great, don't even need to tip em.  Good luck out there.
I'll be there with mine...    Go BIG... or go home !
Do you add a split shot on that long dropper to keep it from tangling ?
We have a winner!!! I do like your rocker spoon for sure.
